sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --sysconfdir=/etc: Sets the configuration file directory to avoid the default of /usr/etc.
--libexecdir=/usr/sbin: Puts the server executables in /usr/sbin instead of /usr/libexec.
--enable-ldbm: Build slapd with primary database backend using either Berkeley DB or GNU Database Manager.
make test: Validate correct build of the package.
